entry.title: Armenian POWs: Bakuโs Objectives and International Law

media:group.media:title: Armenian POWs: Bakuโs Objectives and International Law
media:group.media:description:
Dr. Raffi Philllipe Kalfayan is a lawyer in international public law, an associate researcher in Paris Pantheon Assas University and the former Secretary General of the International Federation of Human Rights. In this conversation with CivilNet, he shares his professional insights about the legal intricacies of the detention of military and political leaders from Artsakh. He discusses the serious allegations made against these prisoners of war, the violation of their rights, the motivations behind Azerbaijan's actions, and the international community's role in influencing their release.

media:group.media:description:
ิฑีถีฏีกีญ ีถึีกีถีซึ, ีฉีฅ ิฒีกึีธึีถ ีซีถีน ีกีถีธึีถ ีฏีฟีก ิฒีกึีพีธึีด ีบีกีฐีพีธีฒ ีฐีกีตีฅึีซีถ, ีถึีกีถึ ีฃีฅึีซีถีฅึ ีฅีถ, ีธึีธีถึ ีบีซีฟีซ ีพีฅึีกีคีกีผีถีกีถ ีีกีตีกีฝีฟีกีถ, ีธึีธีพีฐีฅีฟึ ีกีตีถีฟีฅีฒ ีฅีถ ีฐีกีต ีฌีซีถีฅีฌีธึ ีบีกีฟีณีกีผีธีพโค ีีซีพีซีฌีีฅีฉีซ ีีฟีฅีฌีฌีก ีีฅีฐึีกีขีฅีฏีตีกีถีซ ีฐีฅีฟ ีฆึีธึีตึีธึีด ีกีฝีธึีด ีง ีีทีดีกึีฟีธึีฉีตีกีถ ึ ีกึีคีกึีกีคีกีฟีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีฏีฅีถีฟึีธีถีซ ีฟีกึีกีฎีกีทึีปีกีถีกีตีซีถ ีฒีฅีฏีกีพีกึ ิฑึีทีกีฏ ิณีกีฝีบีกึีตีกีถีจึ ิฑีถีคึีกีคีกีผีถีกีฌีธีพ ีฃีฅึีซีถีฅึีซ ีฉีฅีดีกีตีซ ีฌีธึีฝีกีขีกีถีดีกีถ ีงีฉีซีฏีกีฏีกีถ ีฏีธีฒีดีซีถี ิณีกีฝีบีกึีตีกีถีจ ีทีฅีทีฟีธึีด ีงี ีทีกีฟ ีฏีกึึีธึ ีง ีขีกึีฑึีกีฑีกีตีถีฅีฌ ีกีตีฝ ีญีถีคีซึีถีฅึีจ, ีฌีผีฅีฌีจ ีพีฟีกีถีฃีกีพีธึ ีง, ึ ีกีพีฅีฌีซ ีพีกีฟ ีฌีซีถีฅีฌ ีนีซ ีฏีกึีธีฒึ ีีก ีกีถีคึีกีคีกีผีถีธึีด ีง ีถีกึ ีพีฅึีกีคีกึีฑีซึ ีฐีฅีฟีธ ีฃีฅึีซีถีฅึีซ ีฐีธีฃีฅีขีกีถีกีฏีกีถ ึ ึีซีฆีซีฏีกีฏีกีถ ีพีฅึีกีฏีกีถีฃีถีดีกีถ ีฐีกึึีฅึีซีถึ

ยซีีฅึีกีคีกึีฑ ีีกีตีกีฝีฟีกีถยป ีฐีซีดีถีกีคึีกีดีจ 2023-ีซ ีฐีธึีถีพีกึีซึ ีถีธีตีฅีดีขีฅึ ีกีดีซีฝีถีฅึีซ ีจีถีฉีกึึีธึีด ีฝีฟีกึีฅีฌ ีง ีีกีตีกีฝีฟีกีถ ีพีฅึีกีคีกีผีถีกีฌ ึีกีถีฏีกึีธีฒีถีฅึีซ ีกีพีฅีฌีซ ึีกีถ 860 ีคีซีดีธึีดึ ิปีถีนีบีซีฝีซี ีฃีธึีฎีจีถีฉีกึ ีง ีฐีกีตึีฅีถีกีคีกึีฑีธึีฉีตีธึีถีจ, ีธึึีกีถีธีีพ ีง ีีกีตีกีฝีฟีกีถีจ ีฃึีกีพีซีน ีพีฅึีกีคีกึีฑีซ ีฐีกีดีกึ, ีธึึีกีถีธีีพ ีฅีถ ีฐีกีตึีฅีถีกีคีกึีฑีถีฅึีถ ีซีถีฟีฅีฃึีพีธึีด ีฐีกีตีกีฝีฟีกีถีตีกีถ ีดีซีปีกีพีกีตึีธึีด ึ ีซีถีนีบีฅีีฝ ีง ึีธีญีพีฅีฌ ีึีตีธึีผึีซ ีฝีกีฐีดีกีถีธึีดีถ ีกีผีฐีกีฝีกึีกีฏึ ิฑีตีฝ ีฐีกึึีฅึีซ ีดีกีฝีซีถ ีีซีพีซีฌีีฅีฉีจ ีฆึีธึึีฅีฌ ีง ยซีีฅึีกีคีกึีฑ ีีกีตีกีฝีฟีกีถยป ีฐีซีดีถีกีคึีกีดีซ ีฐีกีดีกีฐีซีดีถีกีคีซึ ึ ีฃีธึีฎีกีคีซึ ีฟีถึ ึีฅีถ ีีกึีคีกีถ ีีกึีกีทีฌีตีกีถีซ ีฐีฅีฟึ

entry.title: High-profile Armenian POWs remain in Azerbaijan

media:group.media:title: High-profile Armenian POWs remain in Azerbaijan
media:group.media:description:
๐32 Armenian servicemen were freed from Azerbaijani captivity after a deal with Baku, but many high-profile Armenian prisoners remain in Azerbaijan. ๐Ministerial Meeting of Landlocked Developing Countries opens today in Yerevan with remarks from Prime Minister Pashinyan on principles for establishing peace with Azerbaijan. ๐European Council President Charles Michel says the EU urges permission from Azerbaijan for Nagorno-Karabakh refugees to return home. ๐The Russian-backed Eurasian Development Bank expresses interest in the construction of Yerevanโs Ajapnyak metro station. ๐Link to latest episode of โMindful Leadersโ featuring Teach for Armenia CEO Larisa Hovannisian: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yQfg2h0gYtg

media:group.media:title: Aliyev Buckles Under Pressure
media:group.media:description:
In this week's episode of Insights, host Eric Hacopian delves into Azerbaijan's recent release of 32 Armenian POWs and ongoing negotiations between Armenia, Azerbaijan, and the United States. Hacopian explores the strategic motives and objectives behind these developments while also providing an end-of-year review of Armenia's economic performance in 2023.
